Christian Terjesen

About Me

I'm a passionate maker with a background in Music Arts Technology and Electrical Engineering. I previously founded and led Adventure Audio, where I designed and manufactured unique audio equipment for musicians. More recently, I worked as a Technology Development Scientist, developing advanced X-ray and photon imaging technology. I'm now embarking on a new adventure with my company, 8sevenC, creating innovative tools for musicians and audiophiles, with a growing focus on AI and Large Language Models.

Detailed About Me

Digital Garden

I write about my projects, learnings, and thoughts on my digital garden. You can find my writings there.

My Projects

A selection of my projects on GitHub.

instagram-downloader

A Python script to download images and videos from Instagram.
Python 0 0

petittubeSampler

This project automatically records audio samples from randomly selected YouTube videos using Petittube. The audio is converted into a format compatible with specific SD card-based samplers, organizing the recordings into a structured folder system.
Python 0 0

3D files created in fusion 360 and blender
